column2: I want to report on our progress, C-captain.
It's going slower than we would like it to. *He shakes his head and grabs his temples.* It's hard to work. I have migraines and I'm queasy…
I hope you're doing okay. How are the rest?
Some are doing better, some worse. We're doing our best, Captain. We're doing our best.
I value your work, Gordon. Tell your people that.
I will. You hold on, too.
Heh. Like I have a choice.
